title: Biden Administration in Uphill Climb to Confirm FDA Commissioner Pick
sub_head: Robert Califf is scheduled to meet with 45 senators, seeking to ease concerns about pharmaceutical-industry ties in bid for second stint
body:
The Biden administration is fighting to confirm Robert Califfas Food and Drug Administration commissioner after some Democrats balked at his pharmaceutical-industry ties, and Republicans raised questions about how he would handle abortion issues.
Dr. Califf had served as FDA commissioner at the end of the Obama administration following an 89-4 Senate confirmation vote. He has support from some Republican senators and a bipartisan group of former commissioners for a second stint.
